005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import java.math.BigDecimal;
013import java.math.RoundingMode;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
017
018public interface IDecimalItem extends INumericItem {
019  @SuppressWarnings("null")
020  @NonNull
021  IDecimalItem ZERO = valueOf(BigDecimal.ZERO);
022
023  /**
024   * Construct a new decimal item using the provided string {@code value}.
025   *
026   * @param value
027   *          a string representing a decimal value
028   * @return the new item
029   */
030  @NonNull
031  static IDecimalItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
032    try {
033      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DECIMAL.parse(value));
034    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
035      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(String.format("Unable to parse string value '%s'", value),
036          ex);
037    }
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Construct a new decimal item using the provided {@code value}.
042   *
043   * @param value
044   *          a long value
045   * @return the new item
046   */
047  @NonNull
048  static IDecimalItem valueOf(long value) {
049    return valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(BigDecimal.valueOf(value)));
050  }
051
052  /**
053   * Construct a new decimal item using the provided {@code value}.
054   *
055   * @param value
056   *          a double value
057   * @return the new item
058   */
059  @NonNull
060  static IDecimalItem valueOf(double value) {
061    return valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(Double.toString(value)));
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Construct a new decimal item using the provided {@code value}.
066   *
067   * @param value
068   *          a decimal value
069   * @return the new item
070   */
071  @NonNull
072  static IDecimalItem valueOf(@NonNull BigDecimal value) {
073    return new DecimalItemImpl(value);
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
078   *
079   * @param item
080   *          the item to cast
081   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
082   *         cast to this type
083   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
084   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
085   */
086  @NonNull
087  static IDecimalItem cast(@Nullable IAnyAtomicItem item) {
088    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DECIMAL.cast(item);
089  }
090
091  @Override
092  default IDecimalItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
093    return valueOf(cast(item).asDecimal());
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  default boolean toEffectiveBoolean() {
098    return !BigDecimal.ZERO.equals(asDecimal());
099  }
100
101  @SuppressWarnings("null")
102  @Override
103  default INumericItem abs() {
104    return new DecimalItemImpl(asDecimal().abs());
105  }
106
107  @SuppressWarnings("null")
108  @Override
109  default IIntegerItem ceiling() {
110    return IIntegerItem.valueOf(asDecimal().setScale(0, RoundingMode.CEILING).toBigIntegerExact());
111  }
112
113  @SuppressWarnings("null")
114  @Override
115  default IIntegerItem floor() {
116    return IIntegerItem.valueOf(asDecimal().setScale(0, RoundingMode.FLOOR).toBigIntegerExact());
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Compares this value with the argument.
121   *
122   * @param item
123   *          the item to compare with this value
124   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
125   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
126   */
127  default int compareTo(@NonNull IDecimalItem item) {
128    return asDecimal().compareTo(item.asDecimal());
129  }
130
131  @Override
132  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
133    return compareTo(cast(item));
134  }
135}
